title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4830.9 - Suspension prior to hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4830.9 - Suspension prior to hearing

State Regulations

The commission by any two members thereof or a duly
designated hearing officer or the municipal governing body may, at any time
during the course of a hearing, inquiry or investigation, suspend any license
issued pursuant to the Bingo Licensing Law, without hearing if, in the
commission"TMs judgment, the continuance of the licensed activity is contrary
to law or inimical to the public interest. Upon suspension, the municipal
governing body or the commission shall forthwith inform the licensee in writing
of the grounds thereof and the date and place set for hearing thereon, said
hearing to be held within 10 days after suspension. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

4830.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
